android.widget
接口 ListAdapter

所有超级接口：
Adapter
所有已知子接口：
WrapperListAdapter
所有已知实现类：
ArrayAdapter, BaseAdapter, CursorAdapter, HeaderViewListAdapter, ResourceCursorAdapter, SimpleAdapter, SimpleCursorAdapter
public interface ListAdapter
extends Adapter

Extended Adapter that is the bridge between a ListView and the data that backs the list. Frequently that data comes from a Cursor, but that is not required. The ListView can display any data provided that it is wrapped in a ListAdapter.

字段摘要
 
从接口 android.widget.Adapter 继承的字段
IGNORE_ITEM_VIEW_TYPE, NO_SELECTION
 
方法摘要
 boolean areAllItemsEnabled()
          Are all items in this ListAdapter enabled?
 boolean isEnabled(int position)
          Returns true if the item at the specified position is not a separator.
 
从接口 android.widget.Adapter 继承的方法
getCount, getItem, getItemId, getItemViewType, getView, getViewTypeCount, hasStableIds, isEmpty, registerDataSetObserver, unregisterDataSetObserver
 

方法详细信息

areAllItemsEnabled

boolean areAllItemsEnabled()
Are all items in this ListAdapter enabled? If yes it means all items are selectable and clickable.

返回：
True if all items are enabled

isEnabled

boolean isEnabled(int position)
Returns true if the item at the specified position is not a separator. (A separator is a non-selectable, non-clickable item).

参数：
position - Index of the item
返回：
True if the item is not a separator
